name: Mosqute
description:
This game was made for the GameBoy Jam #8 https://itch.io/jam/gbjam-8

Damn Mosquitoes!
Kill all the mosquitoes and the final mosquitoboss in this small "GameBoy" game.
Controls:
Move - arrow keys / WASD
Shoot: 'X' / 'Space'
Pause: 'P'

Palette used for the game:

https://lospec.com/palette-list/spacehaze

Credits:
Game Design, Programming art and sfx made by me: Shai Angress
I used sfxr for SFX .

Music: 
- bone666138 (freesound.org) - 8 Bit Video Game Fight Music
- Eric Skiff - Arpanauts
- Reload SFX - nicozkus (freesound.org)
